bundle.description: Whether or not to bundle the build output

bundlePackages.description: List of packages to include in the bundle, anything not in this list will be marked as external

entryPoints.description: List of entrypoints for esbuild to build from

formats.description: Format to output the build files in

injectGlobals.description: Inject import for node stdlib globals

metafile.description: Whether or not to output a build meta file

platforms.description: List of platforms to create individual bundles for

sourcemap.description: Whether or not to output sourcemaps with the build files
